name: Verdant Story
description:
Verdant Story is a 3rd Person Puzzle Platformer. You play as a young girl named Illia who obtains the ability to grow and shrink plants. Illia must use these plants to discover the secrets of her world.Team:Connie Fu - www.conniefu.me
Justin Gazzola - www.justingazzola.com
Nathan Hanlan - www.nathanhanlan.wix.com/nathan
Derek Raven
Jesse Mayama
James Harper
Brendan Iwanyk
Tanner Pye-Richardson - @tannerpr
Steven Lau
